item.title: Use protected browser storage in Blazor | BinaryIntellect Knowledge Base
item.description: In the previous article we learned to use sessionStorage and localStorage in Blazor apps. The localStorage object also has storage event that one can use to get notified when localStorage is modified in some way. In this article we will first discuss the storage event with an example. We will then learn to use what is known as Protected Browser Storage that is available exclusively to Blazor Server apps.
item.author: (Bipin Joshi)

item.title: Oracle Data Provider for .Net: Asynchronous Programming, OpenTelemetry, and More
item.description: Oracle prereleased a new version of Oracle Data Provider for .NET (ODP.NET), its ADO.NET data access library for the Oracle database. The new version, 23c, is available as a Developer Release, which means it is still not ready for production use. However, it already brings two of the most highly community-requested features: asynchronous programming and support to OpenTelemetry.
item.author:
